metadata.title: RA6T2: Development tools for HV inverter kit

sections.content:
Question:
What kind of tools can I get for HV inverter kit?
Answer:
Renesas are offering sensor-less vector control sample code, app note that described sample code contents, schematics, BOM list and Gerber data on Renesas.com.
https://www.renesas.com/RTK0EM0000B14030BJ
Suitable Products
RA6T2
